version_description: Bug fixes and performance enhancements
Bug fixes and performance enhancements

● We've made your log-in experience better. Now the app remembers your log-in credentials, so you don't have to. Ask us to remember your information and we'll keep you logged in for your convenience.
● Choose your rental dates from a single calendar.
● Bug fixes and enhancements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements
•    Bug fixes and enhancements.
• Bug fixes and enhancements.

• Customers can now download, print, and save their receipt.
• Bug fixes and enhancements.
• Bug fixes and enhancements.
• Bug fixes and enhancements.

• Bug fixes and enhancements.
• Ability to add loyalty and reservation information to Apple Wallet.

• Bug fixes and enhancements.
• Driving directions integration with Waze.
• Bug fixes and enhancements.
• Bug fixes and enhancements.

- Ability to Extend your Current Rental
- Updated view of Receipts

- Bug fixes and enhancements.

We’re here to get you there. This update is a part of our regular release to improve stability, reliability and performance. Some highlights in this release are:
* One click transactions
* Bug fixes
* Performance enhancements

- For a selection of pilot Hertz neighbourhood locations, non-Members can speed up their time at counter by completing the new check-in process in the app. Fill in your contact and payment details and validate your driving licence ahead of showing up at the counter!
- As part of our continuous improvement based on user feedback, we also fixed several bugs and improved app performance as well as accessibility.

- For a selection of pilot Hertz neighbourhood locations, non-Members can speed up their time at counter by completing the new check-in process in the app. Fill in your contact and payment details and validate your driving licence ahead of showing up at the counter!
- As part of our continuous improvement based on user feedback, we also fixed several bugs and improved app performance as well as accessibility.

We’re bringing you a brand new calendar experience - where you'll find today’s date highlighted for your convenience. Also, when a location is closed, days are greyed out. A simplified date range selector makes it easier and faster for you to make a reservation and get on the road!
